price: [He is] the Knower of the unseen, He does not reveal His unseen to anyone,
arabic: عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ فَلَا يُظۡهِرُ عَلَىٰ غَيۡبِهِۦٓ أَحَدًا
